attributes.action: commit to not introducing a central bank digital system (CBDC) in the uk
attributes.additional_details: To stop plans to create the central bank digital system within the uk, to keep things as they are with people using cash or their own bank cards and having the freedom of choice to choose what they spend their money on and when!
attributes.background: To stop the future plans of making a central bank digital system within the uk. And to stop plans to have this money programmable

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624159
